title: Magi: The Kingdom of Magic (Dub)
alternative_title: Magi: The Kingdom of Magic, マギ The kingdom of magic
description: Aladdin, Alibaba, and Morgiana's adventures continue in the magical Kingdom of Magnostadt, a country ruled by magicians, and the Reim Empire, which is protected by the Magi Scheherazade.
